class Solution:
    def minimumDistance(self, points: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        
        sums, diffs = [], []
        sum_map = {}
        diff_map = {}
        for i in range(len(points)):
            sums.append(((points[i][0] + points[i][1]), i))
            diffs.append(((points[i][0] - points[i][1]), i))
            sum_map[i] = sums[i]
            diff_map[i] = diffs[i]
        
        
        tmp_sums = sums.copy()
        tmp_diffs = diffs.copy()
        tmp_sums.sort()
        idx = tmp_sums[-1][1]
        del tmp_diffs[idx]
        tmp_diffs.sort()
        res = max(tmp_sums[-2][0] - tmp_sums[0][0], tmp_diffs[-1][0] - tmp_diffs[0][0])
        
        tmp_diffs = diffs.copy()
        idx = tmp_sums[0][1]
        del tmp_diffs[idx]
        tmp_diffs.sort()
        res = min(res, max(tmp_sums[-1][0] - tmp_sums[1][0], tmp_diffs[-1][0] - tmp_diffs[0][0]))
        
        tmp_diffs = diffs.copy()
        tmp_sums = sums.copy()
        tmp_diffs.sort()
        idx = tmp_diffs[-1][1]
        del tmp_sums[idx]
        tmp_sums.sort()
        res = min(res, max(tmp_sums[-1][0] - tmp_sums[0][0], tmp_diffs[-2][0] - tmp_diffs[0][0]))
        
        tmp_sums = sums.copy()
        idx = tmp_diffs[0][1]
        del tmp_sums[idx]
        tmp_sums.sort()
        res = min(res, max(tmp_sums[-1][0] - tmp_sums[0][0], tmp_diffs[-1][0] - tmp_diffs[1][0]))
        
        
        return res
